data.rationale:
Actually the module is only a minor part of what I am trying to do.
    I try not less than to give a standard on how to write good web
    applications. Please visit my WWP web page (at my homepage) for more
    description. The english pages are not complete, but I hope they
    will give a good clue of what I mean.
